text: Presently, the Union Territory of Andaman and Nicobar Islands comprises 3 districts: Code District Headquarters Population (2011) area in square kilometres, and the population density per square kilometre. Area (km²) Density (/km²) NI Nicobar Car Nicobar 36,819 1,841 20 NA North and Middle Andaman Mayabunder 105,539 3,227 32 SA South Andaman Port Blair 237,586 3,181 80 ==History== On 1 August 1974 Nicobar district was separated from Andaman district. On 18 August 2006, Andaman district was bifurcated into two districts: North and Middle Andaman district and South Andaman district. ==References== ==Other websites== * Andaman and Nicobar Islands website *
title: List of districts of the Andaman and Nicobar Islands
